Description: Stateless API + append-only store to register evidence, parse claims, compute contradiction graphs, and emit a verifiable export manifest (hash tree + transform chain). Repo: services/prov-ledger/ (nothing outside). Milestones: M1 Contracts & fixtures; M2 Core write/read paths; M3 Contradiction graph; M4 Export manifest + CLI verifier; M5 Perf hardening & SLOs.
Acceptance Criteria: API & event fixtures stable; contract tests pass. Golden E2E: ingest->resolve->report including manifest verification. p95 latency targets met on seeded dataset. No edits beyond services/prov-ledger/*.

Description: Define contracts (ledger.proto, openapi.yaml), event schemas (claims.registered.v1, contradiction.updated.v1), and golden fixtures.
Acceptance Criteria: ledger.proto and openapi.yaml finalized; event schemas documented; golden fixtures created and versioned.

Description: Implement /evidence/register endpoint with idempotent writes and hash tree storage.
Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns 2xx on valid input; duplicate submissions return same hash; hash tree correctly computed.

Description: Implement /claim/parse endpoint with syntax validation and normalization.
Acceptance Criteria: Claims parsed with syntax errors reported; normalization produces canonical form; edge cases handled.

Description: Implement /claim/contradictions endpoint with graph walk algorithm. Must meet 50k nodes p95<1.5s target.
Acceptance Criteria: Graph walk returns contradictions correctly; p95 latency <1.5s on 50k node dataset; results cacheable.

Description: Implement /export/manifest endpoint producing Merkle summary and transform chain.
Acceptance Criteria: Manifest contains valid Merkle root; transform chain is complete and verifiable; deterministic output.

Description: Implement CLI ledger-verify to validate manifests offline.
Acceptance Criteria: CLI verifies manifest integrity; clear pass/fail output; works without network access.

Description: Implement outbox pattern with Kafka publishing, retry logic, and dead-letter queue.
Acceptance Criteria: Messages published reliably; retries with backoff; dead-letter captures failures; at-most-once delivery.

Description: Add OTEL instrumentation, Prometheus metrics, SLO definitions, and operational runbooks.
Acceptance Criteria: Traces exported; metrics scraped; SLO dashboards configured; runbooks documented.
